flavor_text_entries.black:
This Pokémon was believed to have
been born from the sun. When it evolves,
its entire body is engulfed in flames.
flavor_text_entries.white:
The base of volcanoes is where they make
their homes. They shoot fire from their
five horns to repel attacking enemies.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Said to have been born from the sun,
it spews fire from its horns and encases
itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Said to have been born from the sun,
it spews fire from its horns and encases
itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
flavor_text_entries.x:
Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire
from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire
when it evolves.
flavor_text_entries.y:
The base of volcanoes is where they make their
homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel
attacking enemies.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire
from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire
when it evolves.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
The base of volcanoes is where they make their
homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel
attacking enemies.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
When battling opponents, it sprays fire from its
five horns. The max temperature of the flames
can reach nearly 5,500 degrees Fahrenheit.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
It protects itself with flame. Long years ago,
people believed Larvesta had a nest on the sun.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
The people of ancient times believed that
Larvesta fell from the sun.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Larvesta’s body is warm all over. It spouts fire
from the tips of its horns to intimidate predators
and scare prey.
